name: Bound Arms
description:
This Lora helps produce a girl with her arms bound behind her back, mainly with rope. Models are already alright with this, especially any bondage mixes, but this was made to help with consistency and test the effect of only using illustrations to train bondage. Plus, it helps if you don't want to use a bondage mix either. Generally hands are just obscured while using this, it definitely doesn't help them when they do show. Although I did tag what I saw, I didn't end up including enough "from behind" images in the training set for this to perform well for that.

Trigger Words:

bound arms, arms behind back

technically only "bound arms" is the trigger, but adding "arms behind back" seems to improve its performance.

Note: one issue I've found is a tendency to try and add a gag regardless of prompt, so add

gag, gagged

to the negative prompt to counteract that.

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description: Trained on animefull-final-pruned using 564 images with 2 repeats, batches of 3. Used DAdaptAdam
